title: Step 5 - Manage Residual Privacy and Operational Risks
summary: Ensure any remaining risks are managed through governance, secure handling, and continuous monitoring. Define processes for responsible release and use.
checklist: Establish data use agreements and access controls.
Communicate limitations and intended use to recipients.
Monitor for misuse, breach or re-identification attempts.
Apply retention and disposal policies consistent with data governance standards.
Undertake periodic review and re-approval for ongoing use.
governance_intent: Verify that environment, people, and data controls satisfy the Five Safes framework.
